channel.title: Upgrading my Project to a new verion of UR
channel.description: I been running 4.21 for a while until patch 3 came out and they changed a lot of it. I need to know how to upgrade my project to 4.22.3 from 4.21.x in Wwise. I tried the Wwise web site and google and didn't find anything about how to upgrade my mod.

item.title: Upgrading my Project to a new verion of UR
